output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, aka the 'token Devalue' issue.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a user to transfer more tokens than the allowance of the 'from' address, aka the 'wrong Logic' issue.
Predictable buy function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance, aka the 'Bad Randomness' issue.
Predictable sell function allows attackers to manipulate the contract's balance, aka the 'Bad Randomness' issue.
